name: Xiangli Yao
description: Principal Investigator at Jinzhou Huaxu Academy, and the Academy's youngest multi-disciplinary scientist. A gentle soul with a sharp mind, whose relentless passion for Automata Mechanics always translates into constructive findings and insights.

details.Basic Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
details.Heavy Attack: Perform a charged attack at the cost of STA, dealing Electro DMG.
details.Mid-air Attack: Perform a Plunging Attack from mid-air at the cost of STA, dealing Electro DMG.
details.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

details.Resonance Skill - Deduction: Attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

details.Resonance Liberation - Cogitation Model: Attack the target, dealing Electro DMG. Enter Intuition. When in Intuition: • Obtain 3 Hypercube(s). Each time Resonance Skill Law of Reigns is cast, consume 1 Hypercube(s). Intuition ends once all Hypercubes are consumed. • Basic Attack and Heavy Attack are replaced with Basic Attack Pivot - Impale, which performs up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG. • Resonance Skill Deduction is replaced with Resonance Skill Divergence, which deals Electro DMG. • Dodge Counter is replaced with Dodge Counter Unfathomed, considered as Resonance Liberation DMG.

details.Resonance Skill - Decipher: When Capacity reaches 100, Resonance Skill Deduction is replaced with Resonance Skill Decipher. Consume 100 Capacity to cast Resonance Skill Decipher, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation DMG.
details.Resonance Skill - Law of Reigns: When in Intuition triggered by Resonance Liberation and Performance Capacity reaches 5, Resonance Skill Divergence is replaced with Resonance Skill Law of Reigns. Consume 5 Performance Capacity to cast Resonance Skill Law of Reigns, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation DMG.
details.Mid-air Attack - Revamp: Shortly after casting Resonance Skill Decipher or Resonance Skill Divergence, use Basic Attack to perform Mid-air Attack Revamp at the cost of STA, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation DMG.
details.Capacity: Xiangli Yao can hold up to 100 Capacity. Every Normal Attack Probe on hit grants Capacity. Every Resonance Skill Deduction on hit grants Capacity.
details.Performance Capacity: Xiangli Yao can hold up to 5 Performance Capacity. When in Intuition triggered by Resonance Liberation: • Obtain 1 Performance Capacity when Stage 1 of Basic Attack Pivot - Impale hits a target. • Obtain 2 Performance Capacity when Stage 2 or 3 of Basic Attack Pivot - Impale hits a target. • Obtain 2 Performance Capacity for every Resonance Skill Divergence on hit. • Obtain 3 Performance Capacity for every Mid-air Attack Revamp on hit. • Obtain 2 Performance Capacity for every Dodge Counter Unfathomed on hit.

inherent_skill1.name: Knowing
inherent_skill1.description: Gain 5% Electro DMG Bonus after casting Resonance Skill for 8s, stackable for up to 4 times.

inherent_skill2.name: Focus
inherent_skill2.description: When in Intuition triggered by Resonance Liberation, Xiangli Yao's resistance to interruption is enhanced.

intro_skill.name: Principle
intro_skill.description: Attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

outro_skill.name: Chain Rule
outro_skill.description: Xiangli Yao will call down a laser beam upon the first target the incoming Resonator's Basic Attack hits, dealing Electro DMG equal to 237.63% of Xiangli Yao's ATK to an area. This effect lasts for 8s and can be triggered once every 2s, up to 3 times.

resonance_chain.s1: Resonance Skill Law of Reigns additionally launches 6 Convolution Matrices at enemies, each dealing Resonance Liberation DMG equal to 8% of the skill's DMG Multiplier.
resonance_chain.s2: Casting Resonance Skill or Resonance Liberation Cogitation Model increases Crit. DMG by 30% for 8s.
resonance_chain.s3: Casting Resonance Liberation Cogitation Model increases the DMG of the following Resonance Skill moves by 63% for 24s: Decipher, Deduction, Divergence, and Law of Reigns. This effect can be triggered up to 5 times.
resonance_chain.s4: Casting Resonance Liberation Cogitation Model grants a 25% DMG Bonus to all team members' Resonance Liberation for 30s.
resonance_chain.s5: The DMG Multiplier of Outro Skill Chain Rule is increased by 222%. The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation Cogitation Model is increased by 100%.
resonance_chain.s6: The Hypercubes obtained from Resonance Liberation Cogitation Model are enhanced, increasing the DMG Multiplier of Resonance Skill Law of Reigns by 76%.
